extendedInfo.description: DISCLAIMER: THIS IS A FUN APP AND THE RESULTS ARE TO BE TAKEN IN A LIGHT VEIN. HAVE FUN...Here's a funny Love Scanner that scans your fingerprint and tells who will be the perfect love partner for you from across the world. If you already have a partner, this app will calculate how compatible you are as a couple.How to Play:Find a partner: Just select your gender and put your finger inside the scanning box. Wait for few seconds and let the scanner find your perfect lover from across the world. Curious so as to what kind of a partner you are best suited for? Our scanner uses complex methodology and parameters to find the perfect match for you. So will it be a hottie or a geeky gamer girl (if you are a guy) or a rich sheik or a hot beach dude? Find out from our comprehensive list of partners from every sphere of life and locations, from the exotic to the girl-next-door. The various partner this scanner shows are Zombies, Doctors, gangsters, Angry, Devil, Wrestler, Tattoo artist, Witch, Scary Woman, Prom Queen, Duck face, Ninjas and many more.Compatibility; Scan your fingerprint along with your Partnerâs Finger to find out the result. These results are based on several algorithms which we have developed, based on your finger prints.So find your partner and test your love. Donât forget to share with your friends this funny app!! Please note that this is just a fun app and the results are not real so don't take it seriously. Just enjoy and have good time!Love Test, Love Match, Love Calculator, Love Compatibility Test, Love Compatibility Calculator, Romantic Test, Find Love
